des: "A deliciously spicy drink for the party crowd. You can use low-fat sweetened condensed milk and a lighter cream than heavy if you'd like. This recipe can be used to make Irish Cream - using Irish Whiskey and a bit of chocolate syrup."
ins: In an electric blender, blend heavy cream, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, coconut flavoring, and spiced rum. This drink can be consumed immediately or refrigerated for up to 2 days.
